name: Battle Strike Force
description:
HERO COLLECTION RPG MEETS MASSIVE MULTIPLAYER

The world has collapsed under the mighty fist of the Iron Order. Take command as a Resistance leader in one of the largest 3D MMO worlds on mobile!

FORGE ALLIANCES with other players by joining a guild to reclaim territory and shatter the Iron Order's tyrannical rule. RECRUIT BATTLE-HARDENED HEROES to complete dangerous missions. FORTIFY YOUR BASE and train new soldiers for the Resistance.

Only the strongest guilds can hope to defeat the Iron Order!
FEATURES

THE RESISTANCE
Recruit and train 40+ unique Heroes from three powerful factions. The desert roaming Dune Raiders, high-tech Ardent Legion, or jungle disciplined New Militia

ENGAGE IN TACTICAL SUPERIORITY
Dominate on a real-time massively multiplayer map and control resources

Strengthen your factional alliances and gain access to their weaponry from APCs, Flame Wagons, Sniper Drones and more

FORGE ALLIANCES BY JOINING A GUILD
Work with your Guild to capture, mine and defend War Depots from other rival guilds

Chat and coordinate with your guildmates to earn powerful bonuses to crush your enemies

DEFEND YOUR BASE
Upgrade your base and reinforce your stronghold against constant threats of attack

RAID WAR DEPOTS
War Depots are all over the world, join your guild in mining these valuable resources before your rivals

EVENTS
Participate in events to earn resources, Hero Tags and more!

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Socialize to other players via chat, compete on leaderboards and earn renown
